item.title: 6 Shocking Side Effects of Tulsi ( Holy Basil)
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Tulsi has several adverse effects that may make you reconsider using it. Tulsi, often known as holy basil, is thought to be a magical cure-all herb. Given the wide range of benefits it provides, this is unsurprising. Tulsi is a common ingredient in many home treatments. item.title: 9 Healthy Fat Sources For Vegetarians
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
When people want to reduce weight, they usually start by eliminating fats from their diet, which is incorrect because they need good fats. While non-vegetarians can easily get their fat from meat, vegetarians who do not eat meat or fish may find it challenging to find healthy fat sources. item.title: 14 Major Health Benefits of Fenugreek Seeds
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
In many traditional cuisines, fenugreek seeds are a common ingredient. The benefits of fenugreek have been extensively researched.
